name: Damned Cold
description: Damned Cold is a twin-stick shooter where you play as a prisoner of war trying to escape their captors through killing cold in a reactive diesel-punk world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers Storage: 160 MB available space Additional Notes: For best performance ensure the latest DirectX runtime components are installed.
